includedAssets.title: Uno
includedAssets.synopsis: In 2002, Saul Goodman, going by his birth name of Jimmy McGill, struggles to make it as a lawyer. Opening episode of the critically acclaimed Breaking Bad spin-off.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In 2002, Saul Goodman, going by his birth name of Jimmy McGill, struggles to make it as a lawyer. Critically acclaimed Breaking Bad spin-off.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In 2002, Saul Goodman, going by his birth name of Jimmy McGill, struggles to make it as a lawyer. Opening episode of the critically acclaimed Breaking Bad spin-off.

includedAssets.title: Mijo
includedAssets.synopsis: Jimmy finds himself in way over his head and desperately plans an escape.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jimmy finds himself in way over his head and desperately plans an escape.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jimmy finds himself in way over his head and desperately plans an escape.

includedAssets.title: Nacho
includedAssets.synopsis: Jimmy gets crucial help from an unlikely source as he battles to prove Nacho's innocence.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jimmy gets crucial help from an unlikely source as he battles to prove Nacho's innocence.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jimmy gets crucial help from an unlikely source as he battles to prove Nacho's innocence.

includedAssets.title: Hero
includedAssets.synopsis: Jimmy embarks on a risky advertising campaign with some questionable funding.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jimmy embarks on a risky advertising campaign with some questionable funding.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jimmy embarks on a risky advertising campaign with some questionable funding.

includedAssets.title: Alpine Shepherd Boy
includedAssets.synopsis: When Chuck ends up in hospital, Jimmy learns more about his brother's disease, while he also discovers a new type of client.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Chuck ends up in hospital, Jimmy learns more about his brother's disease, while he also discovers a new type of client.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Chuck ends up in hospital, Jimmy learns more about his brother's disease, while he also discovers a new type of client.

includedAssets.title: Five-O
includedAssets.synopsis: Mike's tragic past is revealed and he is forced to ask for Jimmy's help.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mike's tragic past is revealed and he is forced to ask for Jimmy's help.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mike's tragic past is revealed and he is forced to ask for Jimmy's help.

includedAssets.title: Bingo
includedAssets.synopsis: The Kettlemans come to Jimmy with unrealistic demands, forcing him to cash in a favour to fix things.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Kettlemans come to Jimmy with unrealistic demands, forcing him to cash in a favour to fix things.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Kettlemans come to Jimmy with unrealistic demands, forcing him to cash in a favour to fix things.

includedAssets.title: Rico
includedAssets.synopsis: Jimmy gets closer to his brother as Chuck helps him uncover a scam against his elderly clients.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jimmy gets closer to his brother as Chuck helps him uncover a scam against his elderly clients.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jimmy gets closer to his brother as Chuck helps him uncover a scam against his elderly clients.

includedAssets.title: Pimento
includedAssets.synopsis: Mike gets a new job while Jimmy is faced with a tough decision in the Sandpiper case.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mike gets a new job while Jimmy is faced with a tough decision in the Sandpiper case.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mike gets a new job while Jimmy is faced with a tough decision in the Sandpiper case.

includedAssets.title: Marco
includedAssets.synopsis: Jimmy uses some downtime to meet up with an old friend, and decides to adopt a new outlook on life. Series finale.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jimmy uses some downtime to meet up with an old friend, and decides to adopt a new outlook on life. Series finale.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jimmy uses some downtime to meet up with an old friend, and decides to adopt a new outlook on life. Series finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Long before he becomes Saul Goodman, Jimmy McGill struggles to make it as a lawyer in Albuquerque, New Mexico. Meanwhile, Mike Ehrmantraut tries to protect his family after the loss of his son. Critically acclaimed Breaking Bad spinoff starring Bob Odenkirk and Jonathan Banks.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Before he becomes Saul Goodman, Jimmy McGill struggles to make it as a lawyer in Albuquerque. Breaking Bad spinoff starring Bob Odenkirk.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Long before he becomes Saul Goodman, Jimmy McGill struggles to make it as a lawyer in Albuquerque, New Mexico. Meanwhile, Mike Ehrmantraut tries to protect his family after the loss of his son. Critically acclaimed Breaking Bad spinoff starring Bob Odenkirk and Jonathan Banks.

includedIn.title: Better Call Saul
includedIn.synopsis: The story of how small-time attorney Jimmy McGill transformed into Breaking Bad's crooked legal eagle Saul Goodman.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: The story of how small-time attorney Jimmy McGill transformed into Breaking Bad's crooked legal eagle Saul Goodman.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: The story of how small-time attorney Jimmy McGill transformed into Breaking Bad's crooked legal eagle Saul Goodman.

title: Better Call Saul Season 1
synopsis: Long before he becomes Saul Goodman, Jimmy McGill struggles to make it as a lawyer in Albuquerque, New Mexico. Meanwhile, Mike Ehrmantraut tries to protect his family after the loss of his son. Critically acclaimed Breaking Bad spinoff starring Bob Odenkirk and Jonathan Banks.
